answers.answer: I feel your pain 30-5 with twin boys. Haven't been comfortable in a while. I Just try an take lots of naps an resting in bed watching TV, baths also help with hip pain.. I'm also on bedrest cause I'm already 2cm an 50% but my doctors goal for me is to make it to 32wks (due to high bp/ gestational diabetes) but I'm tryingluck for 34wks at least.. Wishing you luck!  :-)

question: I'm 29+5 with twins although it feels like when I was 38 weeks with my son. I've tried everything and its only temporary relief. Unless someone here has something new for me to try that'd be awesome. Doctor thinks I have at least 4 more weeks to go. I'm 2cm and 60% thinned already. I'm getting soooo restless. Not trying to rush my babies just want to be comfy in my body again lol...
title: Uncomfortable...
